entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
